org.ardenus.graphics

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.graphics.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a rectangle that can be drawn to the screen.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

                             float y,
                             float width,
                             float height,
                             java.awt.Color color,

        Draws a rectangle to the screen.
        Parameters:
        x - the X.
        y - the Y.
        width - the width.
        height - the height.
        color - the color.
        fill - true if the rectangle should be filled, false otherwise.
